articles.title: RIP! Kottayam Pradeep who acted in 'Theri', 'VTV' and 'Raja Rani' passes away - Tamil News - IndiaGlitz.com
articles.description: Actor Kottayam Pradeep, who acted in a few Tamil films and a number of Malayalam films died of a heart attack early this morning (February 17th).  He was 61 and is survived by his wife Maya and two children.
